column5: 4/ As people turn to Google for deeper insights and understanding, AI can help us get to the heart of what they're looking for. We're starting with AI-powered features in Search that distill complex info into easy-to-digest formats so you can see the big picture then explore more https://t.co/BxSsoTZsrp

3/ We'll combine their feedback with our own internal testing to make sure Bard's responses meet our high bar for quality, safety, and groundedness and we will make it more widely available in coming weeks. It's early, we will launch, iterate and make it better.

2/ Bard seeks to combine the breadth of the world's knowledge with the power, intelligence, and creativity of our large language models. It draws on information from the web to provide fresh, high-quality responses. Today we're opening Bard up to trusted external testers. https://t.co/QPy5BcERd6

1/ In 2021, we shared next-gen language + conversation capabilities powered by our Language Model for Dialogue Applications (LaMDA). Coming soon: Bard, a new experimental conversational #GoogleAI service powered by LaMDA. 
https://t.co/cYo6iYdmQ1

Thinking of everyone in T√ºrkiye and Syria who are experiencing devastating loss after the earthquakes. We've activated SOS alerts to provide relevant emergency information to those impacted, and @Googleorg and Googlers will be supporting relief and recovery efforts.

Proud that @googlecloud is providing open infrastructure for the next generation of AI startups. Our new partnership with @AnthropicAI will help them take the power of our large-scale TPUs and GPUs to accelerate safe, cutting-edge AI development.
Inspiring to see that 1M+ researchers have used @DeepMind #AlphaFold to help in their work, solving problems across sustainability, drug discovery, human biology + more. https://t.co/pf4T1p93FV

Summary of great research progress on #GoogleAI, including language models, computer vision, multimodal models, generative ML. We're building it all into current and upcoming products + APIs, look forward to sharing more with everyone soon. Stay tuned! 
https://t.co/bGzLSfxZ0A https://t.co/xAJql9WH4h

One of our new @googlecloud AI tools uses machine learning models to identify billions of products based on visual and text features, helping retailers check their in-store shelf stock. Lots more in store for #GoogleAI in 2023, stay tuned! 
https://t.co/YcSJzMFy59
Happy New Year! Best wishes to everyone for a happy and healthy 2023. https://t.co/NftuCoOCBe
Merry Christmas! Wishing everyone a holiday filled with peace, joy, and love. üéÑ
Excited that @NFL Sunday Ticket is coming to @YouTube Primetime Channels and @YouTubeTV starting with the 2023 season! üèà
@DrSJaishankar @Google Thank you for the great discussion Minister @DrSJaishankar about India's G20 leadership and the critical role of technology in addressing global challenges.
Hanukkah sameach! Ahead of the second night, wanted to wish everyone celebrating a holiday full of light and warmth. üïé

Thank you for a great meeting today PM @narendramodi. Inspiring to see the rapid pace of technological change under your leadership. Look forward to continuing our strong partnership and supporting India's G20 presidency to advance an open, connected internet that works for all. https://t.co/eEOHvGwbqO

Thanks Minister @AshwiniVaishnaw for the lively conversation and to @SharmaShradha for moderating. Energized by all of the exciting things happening in India right now with AI, startups and the next generation of technologists. https://t.co/hDCnkoY8vu

So great to be back in India! At #GoogleForIndia, we introduced a multimodal AI model that covers 100+ Indian languages, ML-powered bilingual search results pages (launching in India first), support for a new center for responsible AI @iitmadras + more. 
https://t.co/coCT8fbR9X

@rashtrapatibhvn Grateful to meet with Madam President and discuss her commitment to education and women's economic empowerment in India. Proud to support with our Read Along app which helps students learn to read, and our commitment to reach 1M women entrepreneurs with our Women Will program.
Search recorded its highest ever traffic in 25 years during the final of #FIFAWorldCup , it was like the entire world was searching about one thing!
One of the greatest games ever. Well played Argentina and France. Jogo Bonito. Nobody deserves it more than #messi, imho the greatest ever to play the game. What a swansong. #FIFAWorldCup
Watching the scenes in Marrakech (one of the most beautiful cities that I have been to) is amazing. Historic moment - first African country to make it to the semis - Congrats Morocco!

Among our latest @Android updates: a new reading mode that makes it easier to customize displays and have the text read aloud at an adjustable speed, especially useful for people who are blind, low-vision or dyslexic. #IDPWD 
https://t.co/IBjy503bhd

@SandhuTaranjitS @Google Thank you Ambassador @SandhuTaranjitS. It was an immense honor to receive the Padma Bhushan, and to have my family there with me today. Grateful to the Indian government and the people of India.

In @Nature: making a traversable wormhole with a quantum computer. A qubit teleported across our Sycamore processor exhibits the dynamics expected from crossing a traversable wormhole, opening up possibilities to test quantum gravity theories. #GoogleAI  https://t.co/I8sofabj8r

Glad to see the Senate move forward on the Respect for Marriage Act today with bipartisan support. Look forward to its final passage so @POTUS can sign it into law and protect the rights of so many families across the country.

Many thanks to guest artist and Marine Corps veteran Monty Little for today's Veterans Day #GoogleDoodle. We're grateful to all veterans and military families, including those in the Google community for their service and sacrifice. https://t.co/ndvyDiMWg0
Amazing momentum for @YouTube: we've surpassed 80 million Premium/Music subscribers globally, including trialers, an increase of 30 million from last year. https://t.co/T8bWjDhZdG

InfiniteNature-Zero, new @GoogleAI research with @berkeley_ai produces high-resolution 3D flythroughs from a single 2D image. The model is trained only on still photos and fills in missing pieces (like other sides of mountains), rendering with high realism https://t.co/BMDZud0hnB https://t.co/k7p0kOwbjl
@FilippoGrandi @Google @Kent_Walker Thanks @FilippoGrandi for your visit to Google and for the vital work that UNHCR does around the world to aid refugees.

We're building an AI model that supports the 1,000 most-spoken languages, a big step in making knowledge more accessible. Already we've developed a model trained on 400+ languages, the most covered by any speech model to date. #GoogleAI https://t.co/TQiS4I3m6S https://t.co/xiqm6AnaX0

3/ Using new advances in AI, we're bringing flood alert coverage to 18 more countries. And we're announcing Google FloodHub, a new platform that brings flood alerts to the general public, not just those in flood prone areas. More on these efforts: https://t.co/TQiS4I3m6S https://t.co/NsSJcrLkYK

2/ Our wildfire tracking system will now identify and track wildfires in real time, helping predict how they will evolve and spread, and keeping people and firefighters informed in Search and Maps. It's one of the ways we're using AI to address the impacts of climate change. https://t.co/hMfU0JUBAZ

1/ From today's AI@ event: we announced our Imagen text-to-image model is coming soon to AI Test Kitchen. And for the 1st time, we shared an AI-generated super-resolution video using Phenaki to generate long, coherent videos from text prompts and Imagen Video to increase quality. https://t.co/WofU5J5eZV

We're rolling out Primetime Channels on @YouTube today! You can sign up and watch TV shows, movies and sports from 30+ streaming services like @Showtime @paramountplus, with more such as @NBA League Pass coming soon. 
https://t.co/NkNiW8jqGz

We're launching a new @GoogleStartups Growth Academy to support cybersecurity-focused startups in Europe. Look forward to helping entrepreneurs bring fresh ideas to the work being done in this space. 
https://t.co/DhHiryHY4K
The alert came just before, felt like a long one, hope everyone is ok https://t.co/mUzLFkkWxz

Some new @YouTube updates including ambient mode, updated dark theme, pinch to zoom (up to 8x!) and precise seeking to help you get to an exact part in a video 
https://t.co/p6N4rlLWbU
@Muhamma91436212 Did that too:) what a spell from Bhuvi and Arshdeep

Happy Diwali! Hope everyone celebrating has a great time with your friends and family. 
ü™î I celebrated by watching the last three overs again today, what a game and performance #Diwali #TeamIndia #T20WC2022

Work from our @GoogleAI team - training robots to play table tennis to better understand how they learn in dynamic + high-speed settings. One project achieved a 300+ hit rally, while another is focused on matching the precision of amateur human players üèì
https://t.co/5MrXl7pYcF

Sweet! Pixel 7 Pro ranked #1 smartphone by @DXOMARK!
https://t.co/u8ODVbQ9pt

In honor of Hispanic Heritage Month, today's musical #GoogleDoodle celebrates Tito Puente, an American musician, songwriter, bandleader, and record producer of Puerto Rican descent. Many thanks to guest artist Carlos Aponte for your great artwork! 
https://t.co/65H5Wm2NWQ

Really excited about the future of @GoogleCloud. Thanks to all of the businesses and orgs who put their trust in us to help with their digital transformation across data and analytics, AI, security, collaboration, open infrastructure, sustainability + more.

Really enjoyed being back in #Tokyo last week, meeting student developers, helping launch our newest Pixel devices, and taking more than a few selfies! Always good to catch up with Googlers and learned all about ü´∞üèΩ too:) https://t.co/UYXxILEJFW

https://t.co/RUs1kpUFR8

Great to be back in Tokyo where I helped launch our new Pixel devices and shared investments we're making in Japan's digital future, including our Chiba data center opening next year + initiatives to reach people of all ages with digital skills training. 
https://t.co/cyrMbFr5Ew

We announced our first @googlecloud region in Africa to help businesses accelerate their digital transformation. Plus an update on our $1B investment in Africa, including landing Equiano, our subsea cable, and supporting tech talent + nonprofits. 
https://t.co/NcNWBiBgJp
And adding a link to Phenaki as well https://t.co/f7MhsBDfym

Big congrats to @DeepMind on their #AlphaTensor breakthrough! Matrix multiplication is fundamental to modern computation and computer tasks, but the question of how to make this process faster, more efficient has been an open question in math for 50+ years.

Two important breakthroughs from @GoogleAI this week - Imagen Video, a new text-conditioned video diffusion model that generates 1280x768 24fps HD video. And Phenaki, a model which generates long coherent videos for a sequence of text prompts. https://t.co/nTs67r21Sf https://t.co/sOf5clkB3V

Excited to launch Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro with our next generation Google Tensor G2 chip, which brings state-of-the-art #GoogleAI directly to the phone. And introducing our first Google Pixel Watch, with health and fitness insights from Fitbit. 
https://t.co/u4YA6ZlReV
üèéÔ∏èüèÅ

Hurricane Ian continues to devastate communities in the Southeast US. Grateful to the first responders who are helping. We've activated SOS alerts to provide emergency information, and Google + our employees are supporting relief efforts.

At #SearchOn, we shared how we're using AI to help you find what you're looking for in more natural and intuitive ways: multisearch coming in 70+ languages, better visual translation in Lens, immersive view + search in Live View in Maps and more 
https://t.co/u9tkhSYlTb

24 years on and we're still feeling lucky:) Grateful to all of you for your support, and we'll keep working hard to build a more helpful Google for everyone. (Shout-out to the Charlie's Cafe team for today's birthday üßÅ!) https://t.co/j7f30Qn1a2
üõ∞Ô∏èüí•
Just an amazing sporting moment, thanks @rogerfederer  for all those amazing moments
Excited to opensource TensorStore - hope it further accelerates scientific research

This week, we shared how we're partnering with the @UN on sustainability, support for refugees and more. We're committing $25M to a new initiative supporting nonprofits and social enterprises using AI to accelerate the #GlobalGoals. #UNGA 
https://t.co/m44uBNqNPK

To continue helping Ukrainians impacted by the war, we're launching Google Career Certificates in Ukraine and offering free scholarships + support services. Plus, an update on our work with @RESCUEorg to help refugees find housing, legal services + more. 
https://t.co/FAsIq9HMTd
@DritanAbazovic @AtlanticCouncil @FredKempe @ForestWhitaker @niinisto @jokowi @SwedishPM Great to meet you Prime Minister @DritanAbazovic, enjoyed our conversation very much

@FilippoGrandi @Google Grazie @FilippoGrandi, really enjoyed our meeting. We see so much opportunity for technology to help support refugees around the world. Look forward to building an even stronger partnership with UNHCR.
Congrats to Demis and John on this huge honor. Great to see #AlphaFold recognized for the transformational impact it's having on the fields of biology and medicine, amazing work by the whole team.

Many thanks to the @AtlanticCouncil for this honor. Proud of @Google's work to support the people of Ukraine and refugees around the world, and congratulations to all of this year's honorees. https://t.co/X6YG8GYnVN

@SandhuTaranjitS @Google Thank you Ambassador @SandhuTaranjitS for the great conversation. Appreciated the chance to discuss Google's commitment to India and look forward to continuing our support for India's digital future.

Excited to partner with @NASA to bring 3D models of planets, moons and spacecraft to Google Search (and in AR on mobile too!), along with a new @googlearts project exploring our solar system. 
https://t.co/rhYLEXlwkO

Sending our deepest condolences to the people of the UK and around the world mourning the passing of Queen Elizabeth II. Her steadfast leadership and public service have been a constant through many of our lifetimes. She will be missed.

New @googlemaps feature will show the most fuel-efficient route based on your engine type (gas, hybrid, electric or diesel). We're also expanding eco-friendly routing to ~40 countries across Europe, helping people save on fuel and reduce carbon emissions. 
https://t.co/VroWlY3083

As we shared at #GoogleIO, the first 3 demos in our #AITestKitchen offer a way to experience and give feedback on our language model LaMDA. We're now gradually rolling out access to small groups of users in the US. 
https://t.co/mTmJAa8MyO

Proud to celebrate 15 years in Singapore! We've grown from a few dozen to 3,000+ Googlers, and continue to invest in Cloud, AI, digital skills training, online safety education, sustainability + more. #GoogleforSingapore 
https://t.co/N2bRj4T4BO

Congrats to 12th grader Sophie Araque-Liu from Florida! She's our 2022 #DoodleforGoogle winner and her artwork is featured on our US homepage today:) 
https://t.co/8rSIcTCHvN

Powerful stories of the resilience of Afghan women who had to flee and start their lives over again. A reminder of why it's important to continue supporting refugees as they rebuild for the long term. 
https://t.co/Yc32gxn0NE

Happy Independence Day, India! We're commemorating 75 years with a special #GoogleDoodle celebrating family, community and the colorful kites that float in the skies every August 15 üáÆüá≥ 
https://t.co/4Cz3j1pcIp https://t.co/zCrTvfh6cS

Building on our investments in Asia Pacific, we're announcing 3 new @googlecloud regions in Malaysia, Thailand, and New Zealand. Once launched, they'll help provide secure, low-latency services on the cleanest cloud in the industry. 
https://t.co/jfdHxjHzVT

Research and development investments are crucial to scientific breakthroughs and building great products. Glad to see Congress and @POTUS sign the CHIPS and Science Act to help bolster tech leadership in the US.

Proud to join with 23 companies and foundations to launch the Economic Opportunity Coalition. Together, we'll work to help build a stronger US economy through support for small businesses, community finance orgs, underserved communities + more. 
https://t.co/Dv1ZodLCra

One year after open-sourcing its AlphaFold Protein Structure Database, @DeepMind and @emblebi are expanding it from nearly 1M to over 200M protein structures, covering almost every organism that has had its genome sequenced, a huge milestone.

Sharing a few @googlemaps updates today, including more granular cycling route info like steep hills, major roads vs local streets, etc to help you better plan your ride, and photorealistic aerial views of popular landmarks
https://t.co/dfapATqj4F

Lots of new features rolling out on Chromebooks including video editing tools in @googlephotos (coming this fall), PDF editing in Gallery, and light and dark themes:) 
https://t.co/iOYu4p7dL4
Great new partnership with @Shopify to help creators integrate their stores with their @YouTube channels

A new #GoogleAI tool reduces the size of datasets needed for radiology models used to predict abnormalities in chest x-rays, making it easier for researchers to build custom models that can help in disease detection. 
https://t.co/IFSz5kMgE3

Excited to launch a Quantum Virtual Machine which emulates the experience and results of programming one of our quantum computers. It will make it easier for researchers to prototype new algorithms and help students learn how to program a quantum computer. https://t.co/4UHN4F3mtn

Exciting milestone for @YouTubeTV - glad we quickly scaled from the rooftop antenna prototype to supporting over 5 million viewers today! 
https://t.co/K8wEKQbaCS

Special #GoogleDoodle today celebrating the incredible first images from @NASAWebb! üåå 
https://t.co/PGxiJbs1BQ https://t.co/6eRNHCWW4e

I've seen firsthand how computer science education can help kids build the skills they'll need for the future. Happy to join in support for computer science to be in every K-12 classroom across the country.
Stunning image and an incredible moment for science and humanity. Can't wait to see more tomorrow:)

Deeply shocked and saddened at former Prime Minister Abe's passing. The thoughts of Googlers in Japan and around the world are with his family and the people of Japan, and we offer our heartfelt condolences.

ÂÆâÂÄçÊôã‰∏âÂÖÉÁ∑èÁêÜÂ§ßËá£„ÅÆË®ÉÂ†±„Å´Êé•„Åó„ÄÅÈ©ö„Åç„Å®ÊÇ≤„Åó„Åø„Å´ÂåÖ„Åæ„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÊó•Êú¨Âèä„Å≥‰∏ñÁïå‰∏≠„ÅÆ„Ç∞„Éº„Ç∞„É´Á§æÂì°„ÅÆÊÄù„ÅÑ„ÅØ„ÄÅÊó•Êú¨„Å®ÂÆâÂÄçÂÖÉÁ∑èÁêÜÂ§ßËá£„ÅÆ„ÅîÂÆ∂Êóè„Å®ÂÖ±„Å´„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂøÉ„Åã„ÇâÂìÄÊÇº„ÅÆÊÑè„ÇíË°®„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ
Oops. Finally someone figured it out:)
@HiddenGeniusPro @Google Great to have you in Mountain View, really enjoyed meeting everyone and hearing all of your innovative ideas. Best of luck - I‚Äôll be rooting for you!

We have long advocated for comprehensive federal privacy legislation and are pleased by progress towards a law this year. Google will continue to support these efforts -- and we hope all parties come together to deliver the nationwide privacy protections Americans deserve.

Tools like Google Translate help refugees communicate with their new communities. Today we're donating an additional 20,000 Pixel phones to @welcomeus so more Ukrainian & Afghan newcomers can feel at home in the US. #WorldRefugeeDay 
https://t.co/OtWZkaEPeB

Our #Juneteenth Doodle today celebrates freedom, family and community. Thanks to father and son artists Jerome and Jeromyah Jones for the beautiful illustration. 
https://t.co/Qtv6NPRDbK

Em 2021, o Google ajudou a gerar R$ 104,5 bilh√µes em atividade econ√¥mica no Brasil. Orgulho em contribuir com um novo Centro de Engenharia em S√£o Paulo, 500 mil bolsas para treinar brasileiros em Certificados Profissionais e muito mais. #GoogleForBrasil https://t.co/9RYZKmYV3Q

In 2021, Google helped generate $19.4B (R$ 104.5B) of economic activity in Brazil. Proud to contribute to these efforts with a new S√£o Paulo Engineering Center, 500,000 Google Career Certificate scholarships to train Brazilians + much more #GoogleForBrasil https://t.co/wmhBFpWO0K
Great conversation with @guyraz, thanks for having me!

So happy to meet entrepreneurs @FatimaAlvarez, @TareqHadhad and Deana Neely and join them on stage at #SummitAmericas. All 3 have inspiring stories about how they got started, and how online tools have helped them grow and expand their businesses. #GrowWithGoogle https://t.co/XViBbPtHtr

@JustinTrudeau @SummitAmericas Thank you Prime Minister @JustinTrudeau for a productive conversation about Google's long-standing investment in Canada, our shared priorities, and working together to promote innovation and achieve important policy goals.

@alferdez @Google @JorArguello @SergioMassa @gabicerru Gracias President @alferdez for a great discussion on the role of technology, and how it can create economic opportunity for communities in Argentina. As Google celebrates our 15th anniversary in the country, we look forward to continuing to support its digital transformation.

√â emocionante ver o esp√≠rito de empreendedorismo e inova√ß√£o da Am√©rica Latina. Estou orgulhoso de apoiar a regi√£o com um compromisso de US$ 1,2 bilh√£o para ajudar a acelerar a transforma√ß√£o digital e o crescimento econ√¥mico. #SummitAmericas 
https://t.co/7sI7laRmqM

Es emocionante ver el esp√≠ritu emprendedor y la innovaci√≥n en Am√©rica Latina. Orgulloso de apoyarlo con un compromiso de US$ 1.200 millones para acelerar la transformaci√≥n digital y el crecimiento econ√≥mico de la regi√≥n. #SummitAmericas  
https://t.co/UkfUyALdBL

It's exciting to see the spirit of entrepreneurship and innovation happening across Latin America. Proud to support it with a $1.2 billion commitment to help accelerate digital transformation and economic growth across the region. #SummitAmericas 
https://t.co/FNkIuTQBX0
Excited we're partnering with @figma to bring their collaborative design tools to Chromebooks, and making them more accessible to students through @GoogleForEdu. https://t.co/uvplkug39W

We're sharing more helpful improvements on Pixel, including easier access to vaccine cards, at-a-glance air quality alerts, more translation options in chat, and better audio quality in Meet. Plus the ability to make your own music and video cut-ups:) 
https://t.co/WiraTHEaLo

Exciting to see @b612foundation has identified 100+ new asteroids using a breakthrough computational technique running on @GoogleCloud. It's an example of how access to cloud computational resources can help researchers solve new problems in space & beyond https://t.co/Sve9MJmdMk

While in Warsaw, Poland in March, I announced our Ukraine Support Fund to help Ukrainian entrepreneurs maintain and grow their businesses in a time of war. Today we're welcoming the 1st recipients who will receive financing + mentoring from @GoogleStartups https://t.co/NQQELKCjHN

Thousands of schools in Ukraine have been forced to close due to the war. To help, we're working with @MON_UKRAINE @UNESCO to provide Chromebooks and training for teachers to keep lessons going, expanding Ukrainian educational content on YouTube and more. 
https://t.co/otRtlNeYNS

We're introducing new accessibility tools like alt-text for images in Gmail and Multi-pin on Google Meet. Also expanding our Project Euphonia research, which helps people with speech impairments be better understood, to French, Hindi, Japanese and Spanish. https://t.co/b6daMhy0Rt
So much fun to meet @michaeljosh @ijustine @NBTJacklyn after the #GoogleIO keynote this week. Must admit they taught me a thing or two about filming @YouTube videos:) https://t.co/mISbFh8aN9

Always fun to go super deep on our products on The Vergecast. Chatted with @reckless and @pierce about AI advancements, our growing Pixel portfolio, AR + more! 
https://t.co/5klxnFr6IY
8/ These were just a few things we shared -- we also announced updates across Maps, YouTube, Google Workspace and more! You can catch the TL;DR here: https://t.co/fKSTFblWNH
7/ We introduced LaMDA 2, our most advanced conversational AI yet. The new AI Test Kitchen will offer a way to explore its features with a broader audience. https://t.co/pjAlcd9Vmi

6/ We're adding 24 new languages to Google Translate, spoken by more than 300 million people. We did it with an AI technique called 'zero-shot learning' -- the model learned to translate without ever seeing translations in these languages. https://t.co/rOOBlUJtyq

5/ Excited about our advances in natural language understanding, which can do things like solve math word problems & better answer questions in more languages. Our latest model PaLM demonstrates breakthrough capabilities on language, reasoning & code tasks https://t.co/NNNhw17UZn

4/ To help people stay safe online, we're adding Google Account safety status to apps, launching virtual cards on Chrome and Android to keep payment information safe, and scaling phishing and malware protections for Docs, Sheets, and Slides.  
https://t.co/XZ1hJTXj8I

3/ We're helping devices work better together on Android and beyond. The new Pixel portfolio -- Pixel 6a, Pixel Buds Pro, Google Pixel Watch and Pixel 7 -- brings together the best of our hardware, software & AI to create more helpful experiences. 
https://t.co/aHBODQGlux

2/ In Google Search, we unveiled a new multisearch feature to help people find information about local businesses. And our "scene exploration" advancement uses your camera to pan a scene and show insights about multiple objects in a space. 
https://t.co/Tm5gvxFjuN

1/ At #GoogleIO today we shared how we're advancing two core parts of our mission -- knowledge and computing -- to deliver products that are built to help. Here are a few things we announced: 
https://t.co/RMEe0Nn9n1
Nice to be back IRL at Shoreline! See you soon:) #GoogleIO https://t.co/6A3mtEIAl4

So inspiring to see this collaboration between Ann and John Doerr and @Stanford to create a new school focused on sustainability. First new school in 70 years! Exciting opportunities for next generation of students!

We're excited to offer Google Career Certificate scholarships at no cost to all US businesses to help train employees in areas like IT support, data analytics, and a brand new certificate focused on e-commerce and digital marketing. #GrowWithGoogle 
https://t.co/9WgDDALwCD

It was so great to be back on Stanford campus:) Thank you Archana Sohmshetty and @StanfordGSB students for the great conversation -- always inspiring to spend time with rising leaders. 
https://t.co/vljhxagPCl

Proud to welcome T√°naiste @LeoVaradkar, @IDAIreland to Google today and accept this recognition of our contributions to Ireland. We've been in Ireland for ~20 years, and we'll continue to work together to advance tech, support Irish businesses + more! https://t.co/Ge0fDYsZKD

Proud of the progress we've made to help build a carbon-free future, including supporting our partners as they address climate change and building products that make it easier for people to make sustainable choices. #EarthDay 
https://t.co/ssLGCAFFkp

Excited to open our first product development center in Africa later this year. We're hiring engineers, product managers, UX designers and researchers in Nairobi who want to build helpful products and services for people in Africa and around the world. 
https://t.co/JaFZcWUbjv
Happy Easter to all who celebrate around the world. Wishing you a day full of joy, gratitude and renewal - hope you're able to share it with those you love.
Chag Sameach to everyone observing Passover! I hope you'll enjoy the comforts of food, tradition, and community as you celebrate.

We're announcing plans to invest ~$9.5B in communities across the US and create 12K+ new jobs at Google in 2022. This builds on the hundreds of billions in economic activity Google helped provide last year for US businesses, creators, nonprofits and more. 
https://t.co/qMopLWGBcI

We‚Äôll offer more location choices around where to work -- in one our many campuses -- as well as the option to be fully remote based on role and team needs. And we‚Äôll offer flexible benefits like the option to work from anywhere for up to 4 weeks a year.

...spending time in another city for part of the year, or even moving there permanently. Google‚Äôs future workplace will have room for all of these possibilities. We‚Äôre moving to a hybrid work week with most Googlers in the office approximately 3 days a week.

The future of work at Google is flexibility. The majority of our employees still want to be on campus some of the time yet many would also enjoy the flexibility of working from home a couple days a week‚Ä¶
